text: , is an imprint of the Japanese record label Victor Entertainment. The Colourful Records imprint was created on June 1, 2011 to specialize in the production and promotion of pop music acts. ==Artists== * Ammoflight * Batten Showjo Tai * Cocco * Edda * Going Under Ground * Leo Ieiri * Ayaka Ide * Iri * Kiroro * Kotone * Mitsuhiro Oikawa * Pile * Rekishi * Scandalhttp://www.her- label.com/ * Ko Shibasaki * Mariko Takahashi * Xmas Eileen * Aoi Yamazaki * Yogee New Waves * Rinne Yoshida ==References== ==External links== * Category:Victor Entertainment Category:Japanese record labels Category:Record labels established in 2011 Category:Mass media companies based in Tokyo
title: Colourful Records
